Message:
I was just a coward,
but Rean made that
promise to me.

Even though I was still unable
to step outside my room,
Rean was far from upset.

With the words, “I promise,”
she took my hand,
and brought me into
the world outside.

The sights I saw for the
first time were so bright,

and so gentle that they
brought tears to my eyes...

All my fears had
instantly faded away.

Rean must have shared
some of her courage with me.

From then on,
I began going outside
to play with Rean.

Dear sister Zara and
dear sister Skuld eventually
joined our little group,
adding even more to the fun.

In time, there may
come a day when
Rean leaves the village,
just like everyone else.

Even so, right now...
Even if it’s just for
this brief moment...
I want to be with her...!

I made that wish deep
in my heart each time
I saw Rean smile.

But, the time for us to
say goodbye came when
we least expected it.
